data.title: Hadong – Travel guide at Wikivoyage
data.snippet: Hadong (하동) is a county in South Gyeongsang Province, South Korea, well known for its scenic landscapes and traditional tea culture.

data.title: The Best Ha Dong Travel Guide & Things To Do | ORIGIN VIETNAM
data.snippet:
In particular, it is famous for the oldest silk weaving village in Vietnam, Van Phuc, and other historical and cultural relics. Ha Dong is one of the favorite destinations for many tourists today. Let’s learn more about this unique place with Origin Vietnam.

## 1. Where is Ha Dong?

Ha Dong is a bustling district of Hanoi, Vietnam. About 12 km southwest of the city center and about 33 km south of Noi Bai International Airport. Geographical location:

 Bordering Nam Tu Liem district to the North.
 The South borders Thanh Oai district.
 The East borders Thanh Tri district, Thanh Xuan district.
 The West borders Hoai Duc, Chuong My, Quoc Oai districts.

## 2. How is Ha Dong unique?

Ha Dong is a land rich in cultural traditions and is one of the fastest growing localities in the city. [...] Traditional beauty combined with development and integration with society creates a very unique and beautiful Ha Dong. When travelling to Ha Dong, you will be able to admire the beautiful natural scenery such as the flower road, Van Quan Lake, … to the ancient beauty such as Van Phuc silk village, Ha Dong cathedral, … Each location will definitely leave a lasting impression on visitors.

In particular, Ha Dong district is like a separate kingdom, because here there are all the services of entertainment, shopping, recreation, … Along with bustling residential areas, it is not inferior to the inner city of Hanoi.

## 3. When is the best time to visit Ha Dong? [...] With a long history of development, Ha Dong district has attracted people from all over, creating a multicultural, multi-religious community. This diversity is not only reflected in architectural style, but also in the cuisine and multi-dimensional lifestyle of the residents.

Not only that, along with economic prosperity, Ha Dong also honors and preserves precious cultural heritages, demonstrated through the careful care of temples, churches and historical sites. The multicultural community in Ha Dong has created a diverse and rich cultural space in terms of language, costumes and customs here. It adds color to the bustling urban life here.

data.title: Hadong County - Wikipedia
data.snippet: Hadong County is a county in South Gyeongsang Province, South Korea. It is located on the far-west side of the province, bordering South Jeolla Province.

data.title: Hadong Tea | Globally Important Agricultural Heritage Systems
data.snippet: Hadong, referred to as the home of tea, is the capital of tea culture with various folk songs, poems and songs of our ancestors and people of today.

Musical artist

In this Korean name, the family name is  Ha "Ha (Korean surname)"). [...] Ha Dong-kyun (Korean: 하동균; born June 28, 1980), officially known as Ha Dong Qn, is a South Korean singer-songwriter. He debuted in 2002 as a member of the short-lived boy band 7Dayz, before joining the boy band Wanted "Wanted (South Korean band)") in 2004. As a solo singer, he has released two albums: Stand Alone (2006) and Another Corner (2008), and three extended plays: Mark (2012), Word (2014), and Polygon (2017).

Drama Series [...] Ann PerezMar 17 2017 10:34 am He is so cute?

SHFMar 16 2017 9:30 pm Omg!!! Speaking Tanzanian in episode 16 of Chief Kim...he's so funny and cute! Lol His performance in Last was quite impressive, too! Please DON'T EVER get eyelid surgery! Your eyes are beautiful!!! I await your next project!

Donor MacneiceMar 12 2017 10:44 am Dong Ha is one of the best young actors on the Korean circuit. His performance in "Good Manager"or "Manager Kim" is a really convincing portrayal of a young man from a high profile family who becomes unhappy with the way his father's huge company treats ts employees. I hope we can see a lot more of Dong Ha on our TV screens in the future, and I also hope that he will get an award for his role as supporting actor in this role.. [...] Donor MacneiceMar 28 2017 11:01 am Dong Ha may handsome and considered cut and sexy, but that is not the point. The important thing is that he is an incredible actor. He is sincere in every roll he plays and this sincerity comes across to the audience. The fact that he is good looking is a plus of course, but it is his acting that is important. I have been in the theatre, radio and TV all my life in Dublin, London and America until I retired. If I was still working, he would be an actor I would want to direct and produce. I would love to get in touch with him as I am often in Korea and live in a neighbouring country. Thank you Dong Ha for all your excellent work and for being also a very nice and humble person.

Ha Do-yeong (Korean: 하도영) is a character in the Korean drama series The Glory. He is portrayed by Jung Sung-il.

## Contents

## Biography

Do-yeong is the wealthy and powerful CEO of Jaepyeong Construction, a prominent construction company. He is married to Park Yeon-jin and they have a daughter. He uses his wealth to make their family’s problems disappear. [...] | Characters |

data.title: Mapping informal/formal morphologies over time: Exploring urban ...
data.snippet: The article explores and maps the adaptations of informal/formal morphologies in Hanoi and Ho Chi Minh City over 120 years.
